data.title: Composition and structure in film posters
data.meta_description: Have you ever wondered what the design process for creating a movie poster looks like? I've put together an article that explains my workflow – knowledge that will hopefully help you to get the most out of working with your designer and demystify the experience.
data.meta_site_name: Strelka / Movie Poster Design & Key Art
data.text:
Everything in its place

Martin Scorsese said “Cinema is a matter of what’s in the frame and what’s out”.

The same is true with the art of poster design. A poster designer needs look deep into the heart of the story itself – to decide what needs to be ‘in the frame’ resulting in work that teases the viewer with what makes this film truly unique and ultimately makes them have to watch it.
